author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

We are adding a few improvements on the O2O command line tools:
- Support of 'frequent' flag, allowing to display the logs with a more appropriate interface
- Move all of the timestamp involved in the steering to UTC 

The timestamps for the logs already stored in the DB will be migrated to UTC.
Modifications on the corresponding web service will follow

#### PR validation:

Stand-alone test of command functions
title: Improvements of O2O steering tools
